title: Font for "Miller Lite" logo
content:
Anyone know font for this famous logo?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091515im_/http:/typophile.com/files/14291_BlueSoda%20%20%20%20%202_3832.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content: Like almost every good logo, it's hand drawn.

Nope..... i got it  
here are both of them :)

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer/draft-beer/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091515/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer/draft-beer/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer/draft-beer/")

[http://www.fonts101.com/Zipfiles/lamesa.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091515/http:/www.fonts101.com/Zipfiles/lamesa.zip "http://www.fonts101.com/Zipfiles/lamesa.zip")
The fonts were based on the logo. Not the other way round.

Did you click on the 'About' for the Draft Beer font? The other one is on a free font site... do you REAL think they would use that?

"Draft Beer is a bold script suitable for logos, letterheads & headlines and was inspired by the lettering used by Miller Brewing Co."
